ag_banner.title: About RAS
description: The IEEE NSU Robotics and Automation Society Student Chapter, established on January 5th, 2017, is a pivotal technical chapter within the IEEE NSU Student Branch.
It focuses on research, study, and knowledge exchange in Robotics & Automation and is the first RAS chapter in Bangladesh.
Through continuous evolution and member training, the chapter shapes future leaders in the field while upholding IEEE RAS standards of excellence.

ag_banner.title: About PES
description: IEEE NSU PES Student Branch Chapter advances knowledge in electric power and energy.
It ranked 5th in IEEE Region 10 as a High Performing Student Branch Chapter in 2020.
The chapter received back-to-back awards from 2021â€“2024 for excellence in power and energy research.

ag_banner.title: About IAS
description: IEEE IAS bridges the gap between academics and industry, fostering practical learning and career growth.
IEEE NSU IAS was formed on June 9, 2018, prioritizing collaboration between students and corporations.
The society has successfully organized summits and workshops with professionals to guide future engineers.

ag_banner.title: About WIE
description: IEEE NSU Women in Engineering Affinity Group empowers women to pursue careers in STEM.
Established on June 20, 2016, WIE actively works to increase female representation in IT and engineering.
Through workshops, mentorships, and events, it fosters confidence and technical skills among female students.
